sentences.en: Aristide spoke to the press through an interpreter.
sentences.cn: 阿里斯蒂德通过口译员向媒体发表讲话。

sentences.en: Every photo interpreter should be familiar with basic principles of photogrammetry.
sentences.cn: 每个象片解译人员都应当熟悉摄影测量学的基本原理.

sentences.en: He knows a little Chinese, so he can do without an interpreter.
sentences.cn: 他懂一点中国话, 所以可以不用译员.

sentences.en: He serves as an interpreter for us.
I had my admirable interpreter of the previous year Major Birse.
sentences.cn: 去年我有一位可钦佩的译员伯尔斯少校.

sentences.en: She thinks of putting in for the position of interpreter.
She works as an interpreter in that company.
sentences.cn: 她在该公司里担任翻译员.

sentences.en: Speaking through an interpreter , the President said that the talks were going well.
sentences.cn: 总统通过译员说会谈进展良好。

sentences.en: Speaking through an interpreter (= using an interpreter ), Ahmed said, ‘I’m very worried about my wife and children.’
sentences.cn: 艾哈迈德通过口译者说:“我很担心我的妻子和孩子们。”

sentences.en: The clarity of resolution can be never too good for interpreter.
sentences.cn: 对于解译人员来说,清晰度可能从来都不是很满意的.

sentences.en: The result obtained by smoothing contours is inevitably biased by the interpreter.
sentences.cn: 通过平滑等值线得到的结果必然带有解释人员的倾向性.

sentences.en: We employ her as an English interpreter.
sentences.cn: 我们雇用她作英语翻译.

sentences.en: We must allow him to be a good interpreter.
sentences.cn: 我们必须承认他是个好译员.

sentences.en: When Bethune looked inquiringly at Tung, the interpreter stepped forward.
sentences.cn: 白求恩探询地望望董的时候, 这位翻译就走上前去.

words.tran_cn: 可说明的；可判断的；可翻译的

trans.tran_cn: 解释者，口译译员，[军事]判读员，[自]翻译器
trans.tran_en: someone who changes spoken words from one language into an-other, especially as their job
